name: Intro
_source: speak;Nelad;I took a vow of peace. I swore to never use my bending for violence.;;;no_talk
speak;Nelad;But what does that vow mean...|If there is no one left who took it up along side me?
speak;Juro;Burn it all. Let the dirt rumblers scream all they want.|We are the Fire Nation, and nothing stands in our way!
speak;Nelad;They don't stop. This world is breaking because of them. It is happening, because of their thirst for power.;top;;thought_bubble
speak;Nelad;I will put a stop to this!;;;cinematic
